text: The enthalpy of atomization is the heat change that resulted to the separation or disintegration of all atoms in a chemical substance. ΔatH or ΔHat., means "Enthalpy of atomization". Atomization means to break bonds in a substance, so that the atoms in the substance, go into the gas phase. == References == *Enthalpy (in comparison to Entropy) == References == Category:Chemistry
title: Enthalpy of atomization
